purpose: Translate expanded family delta JSONs into authoritative contextual embeddings.
Use those embeddings to classify, catalog, and pre-assign routing targets for existing files.
Prepare the system for a later header-injection pass without performing it now.

core_principles.name: Classification Before Mutation
rules: No file content changes are permitted in this phase.
All actions are analytical, declarative, or cataloging only.

core_principles.name: Contextual Embedding Is Authoritative
rules: Semantic tags, operation types, data roles, control roles, and spine bindings derived from expanded deltas are treated as ground truth.

core_principles.name: Existing Structure Is Preserved
rules: All routing decisions must target existing directories only.
If no valid existing location exists, mark the item as UNROUTABLE_PENDING_REVIEW.

core_principles.name: Dual-Use Output
rules: Every classification must be usable by VS Code automation (machine rules) and human review (documentation).

core_principles.name: Header Deferral
rules: Header insertion, normalization, or rewriting is explicitly forbidden in this phase.
This phase exists to make the header pass trivial and error-free later.

allowed_actions: Assign layer, role, runtime spine phase (if determinable), intended destination (existing path only).
Record results in catalogs or reports.

Phase_Orchestration_And_Entrypoint.description: Procedural orchestration and system entrypoint layer. Sequences axioms and semantic contexts into executable runtime flows.
Phase_Orchestration_And_Entrypoint.notes: This phase composes meaning-bearing layers into executable pipelines. It is not itself semantic.
